lyrics:
36 contributorshere to stay lyricsverse 1
this time im taking it away

not by design
so i take my face

i wont have to see the pain
pain pain

anticipating all the fucked up feelings again

oh i cannot grieve anymore

im not im not a whore
youve taken everything and aahaahaah
oh i cannot give any more
